solution_line_template: Jack will have {initial_sugar}-{sugar_used_tomorrow} = <<{initial_sugar}-{sugar_used_tomorrow}={sugar_tomorrow}>>{sugar_tomorrow} pounds of sugar tomorrow.
Jack will have {sugar_tomorrow}+{sugar_bought_following_day} = <<{sugar_tomorrow}+{sugar_bought_following_day}={sugar_end}>>{sugar_end} pounds of sugar the following day.
